column1:
10.3.4.5	
Recommendations for the treatment of arterial priapism
Investigate both partners simultaneously to categorise the cause of infertility.

Infertility should be evaluated after six months of attempted conception when the female 
partner is aged > 35 years.

Examine all men seeking medical help for fertility problems, including men with abnormal 
semen parameters for urogenital abnormalities.
